TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

span.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类以将绑定的值属性，如或，到参数化的 SQL 查询、 业务对象方法或筛选表达式中使用的参数。You can use the class to bind the value of a property, such as or , to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression. 类提供除继承自两个属性类：和。The class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the class: and . 属性标识哪些要绑定到实例和属性标识的公共属性从中类检索一个值。The property identifies which instance to bind to and the property identifies the public property of the from which the class retrieves a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将显示在数据绑定控件添加到的所选值在声明性方案中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 对象添加到集合控件在表单上，并对应于"@Title"中的占位符文本属性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是必需的属性标识实例对象绑定，以在运行时。The property is a required property that identifies the instance that the object binds to at run time. 通常情况下，和属性设置为方法以正确绑定到控件。Typically, the and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果你未设置属性，方法抛出异常异常时调用。If you do not set the property, the method throws an exception when called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将显示在数据绑定控件添加到的所选值在声明性方案中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 对象添加到集合控件在表单上，并对应于"@Title"中的占位符文本属性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和属性以确定控件的对象绑定到。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 该示例填充具有值的控件。The example populates a control with values. 属性控件用于检索的数据进行筛选控制和显示控件。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象尝试将绑定到对象和属性每次调用方法。The object attempts to bind to the object and property every time the method is called. 方法返回通过的组合标识的控件的属性的值和属性。The method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the and properties. 类永远不会使用属性，继承自，当绑定到控件的属性的值。The class never uses the property, which is inherited from , when binding to a control's property value. > [!NOTE] > 在此实现中的方法，`context`参数将被忽略。In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored. 如果`control`参数是`null`，`null`返回。If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的公共属性对象由标识属性，对象绑定，以在运行时。The property identifies the public property of the object identified by the property that the object binds to at run time. 可以将设置为一个简单的字符串，如"SelectedValue"，或表达式使用语法来标识复杂控件属性。 can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using syntax to identify complex control properties. 虽然属性通常是可选的同时和属性设置为方法以正确绑定到控件。While the property is optional, typically both and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果你设置属性但不是属性，方法试图使用属性用于标识默认属性。If you set the property but not the property, the method attempts to use the attribute to identify a default property. （它位于控件作者，此属性指定的责任。）如果此操作失败，引发异常。(It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, throws an exception. 下表标识了哪些 ASP.NET 控件修饰属性与属性。The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the attribute. |控件Control|属性Property| |-------------|--------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将显示在数据绑定控件添加到的所选值在声明性方案中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 控件派生自控件。The control derives from the control. 对象添加到集合控件在表单上，并对应于"@Title"中的占位符文本属性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和属性以确定控件的对象绑定到。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 该示例填充具有值的控件。The example populates a control with values. 属性控件用于检索的数据进行筛选控制和显示控件。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]
